content.detailedDescription:
On sept 14, 2013 i was behind the museum of science and industry about 8:45 pm. looking south i saw red lights at a distance between the trees rising as if it were fireworks. looking up towards the moon i noticed they were traveling from the south to the north going directly above my head. they were at a very high altitude. going in a straight line at a constant speed i counted about a dozen red lights. this line, not a perfect formation lasted about 2 minutes, directly after this i noticed two airplanes, coming from the southeast. they were at a low enough altitude for me to see the whole shape of the plane. these two planes crossed paths. this is unusual because i would consider this a near crash. would you please investigate this situation. i was in my proper fram of mind and this is not a hoax. at least check about the near miss with the two planes. one plane was on an intercept course towards the redlights. the lights dissappeared before downtown . there was no trail of light. the red lights were a perfect circle as they were approaching me, while overhead and as the past me. this in itself is unusual.
 i did not take pictures but i was not the only one who saw this. the sky was clear that night. the objects were very high and about half inch in diameter.
content.summary: About a dozen red lights flying over chicago followed by two airplanes that crossed paths

content.detailedDescription: Me and some friends were outside one night and saw what appeared to be a flare, except it lasted longer than a flare should and i saw the same thing again about 15 miles from the first sighting. it was a red orb like object with a long red tail following it.
content.summary: Flare like object observed twice

content.detailedDescription:
Few (6-10) distant lights noticed on horizon. its location never had any similar light appearance. lights were immobile for some time, after which (some of them) started moving one by one slowly upwards or in other direction. no sound, vibration or other sensation noticed. four people noticed this. some evidence of same event noticed by people on twitter at same location. after some time (20-30 minutes) lights slowly vanished.
no coverage in local media registered.
content.summary: Few strange lights

content.detailedDescription: Witnessed by my room mate. she stated it's ok to report it and she would talk to you.  at approx. 9:30pm, on september 12th, 2013, she was standing out side in the driveway talking on her phone. she said she looked up at the stars and saw a bright star begin to sparkle then it exploded. a few minutes later, she saw another bright star start to sparkle and she took  a picture with her phone and caught it right when it exploded. when they disintegrated, light projected from both sides. when she first told me about this, i thought she might have seen a supernova. when she said it happened the second time a few minutes later, i thought it should be reported to you. she texted me the photo and i have texted it to my e-mail. looking at the photo, it looks like a cloud around the actual explosion or disintegration. when i am home i can e-mail it to you or i can text it to you at any time.
content.summary: Starlike started sparking then exploded-took about 10 seconds

content.detailedDescription:
We were at a barbeque and were talking. i looked up in the sky and saw two orange lights just hovering. i was like what the f*** they were flickering from orange to white. then one took off in a split second to the left of me and re appeared on the right and was moving slowly. then hovered again. i have video of it!

here is the link to the video. i dont have it on my computer to upload.

[link moved to fi section/cms/tg]
content.summary: Second sighting in 2 months

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was standing on my front porch, looking at the sky. my neck began to hurt, so i looked down for a moment to give my neck a rest from looking upwards. as i looked up, directly over my head was a glowing object streaking above. almost just as soon as i spotted it, it disappeared, directly over my head. it was a large object, very bright. from my vantage point, the object was almost the size of a dime in the sky. it was mostly white but had hints of yellow around the side. it was moving very fast. i saw the object for maybe a second. it was moving directly in my direction and as i noticed it, it completely disappeared; directly above my head. it was pretty low, hard to tell but maybe 500 ft or less above. in my backyard there are 12 acres of woods, it came from that direction - east to west. from the thompson lake area to whitney pond.

the fact that the object disappeared directly above me, made me a bit nervous. i had my girlfriend come out to the deck. we continued to view the sky. i was looking east and her west. about 10 minutes after i saw the object, she saw a light, "much brighter than a star," appear from nowhere. the object moved at a very high rate of speed, then disappeared. she viewed the object for approximately one second.
content.summary: Large, bright light streaked above my head at a high rate of speed, it vanished almost immediately once i saw it. my girlfriend then saw a similar one but smaller.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in the hot tub out back with my husband (we do not have a screen or coverings). it was a clear sky about 9 pm and only one little section of clouds. my husband spotted one first and told me to look up. we saw it coming from one side of the sky and fly to the other. this took a while. and then all of the sudden it shot straight up into the atmosphere and disappeared. once gone, a second one came from the same direction the first one did. it followed the same path and then disappeared in the sky shooting straight up. then a third one did the same exact thing. this probably took 5 minutes. we had plenty of time to view each one as they flew across the horizon-very high in the sky and very far away. i had enough time to call my eldest son on his cell and tell him to come outside and watch. he got to see the second and third ones. my husband did not believe in ufo's, but now he does. it was simply amazing and we have never seen anything like it.
content.summary: Three came one at a time and were reddish/orangish in color almost like flames, but spherical in shape.

content.detailedDescription: My son and i were camping, sitting outside at the campfire and i noticed an orange glowing object immediately to the west moving due north, i told my son to look quickly, we watched it travel due north for about a minute then it turned heading northwest and within another minute it disappeared with a small flash of white light. during the entire duration of the event there was  absolutely no sound from the object and no sign of normal aircraft navigational lights or strobes.
content.summary: Orange object moving with no sound, no strobes, changed direction

content.detailedDescription: My wife, i and our two children were leaving selmer going west on 64 hwy approaching sulphur springs rd. my wife called my attention to the object which was shiny metallic in color but not reflective as it was sunny and clear, the object was cigar shaped and it was stationary in a west southwest direction referenced from 64 hwy, at an elevation of maybe 75-80 degrees off of the horizon, we all observed it for maybe 30 seconds when we thought it had vanished, i then observed it in a north northwest position from the highway same approx elevation about 2 seconds later we pulled over and watched it it remained stationary, after about another minute and a half 2 bright lights ejected from each end of it, the lights traveled in a spiral in opposite directions from each other and then disappeared, we continued to watch the object for approx another minute the it vanished and we left.
content.summary: Heading w on 64 out of selmer observed metallic craft stationary to w/sw, it then appeared in a nw direction in roughly a couple of seconds, observed it for about a minute and a half, 2 lights ejected from each end in opposite spirals then disappeared,ect

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
In springfield oregon 10:53 september 4th.We were coming back from a campsite when we were pulling into our drive way. my dad said he saw a  blue light shooting things out the back of it. my mom didn't belive him so she looked and saw it to then .We started following it we followed it all the way to a parking lot. we sat in are car and watched it it was going really fast 
so we knew it wasnt a star. it stoped then started agian.It moved up and down very rapedly and then it turned toward us and started moving towards us. it kept disappearing and coming back. my mom got a little chilled and thought it was weird because she was talking about how weird the sky looked that night it was a gray and black with a white tinted bottem.I knew it wasent a meteor because the way it moved and how it disapered. it also wasent disappearing behind clouds because it was completely clear that night and the last time it disappear ed it dissapeared like it was going through a portal.It was also weird because i got sick right after it happend. it scared us so much
content.summary: My dad saw it shoot lights from it then we saw it going realy fast so we followed it and it disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
My parents and i were over at the superstition mountain museum and we were taking pictures to remember our time there. neither myself or parents saw anything in the sky during the times of the photographs. it wasnt until i uploaded the pictures onto the computer and went through them that i noticed that there was something in them . in my opinion the objects in the photo do not appear to be any type of aircraft that i know of ( airplane, helicopter).
i am not surprised to see anything like this on camera but i just want an explanation.
content.summary: By the superstition mountains

content.detailedDescription: I was in my backyard, when i see an bright orange sphere fly overhead from southeast to northwest...I just observed a solid sphere, first in open air then towards my tree top level...Above my tree line,  then i observed ufo slow down almost to a stop and turn around as if to observe me...I initially panicked..But seconds later an f16 flew above me in almost a stall, following this ufo.  i figured the sphere turn around to see approaching f16, not me.   at that point...Ufo started to turn left as it increasingly accelerated and ascended...And f16 almost in a stall turned to the right to gain altitude...With increased after burners...Which i felt was in a stall or loss of power. f16 turning right was gaining altitude while ufo turned left and accelerated until it disappeared.  i observed a couple of helicopters 15 minutes prior 3 miles away as i arrive home that day, then after the siting...I saw helicopters were flying with search lights on the ground and more plane surveilliance for 40 minutes.  the sky was clear and visually perfect to see this event.
content.summary: Orange sphere glowing with f16 trailing at low altitude

content.detailedDescription: I noticed odd object in picture several days later.
content.summary: Did not see until looking at pictures later l

content.detailedDescription: I noticed odd object in picture several days later.
content.summary: Did not see until looking at pictures later l

content.detailedDescription:
Ufo spotted while observing airliner fly by: time: ~ 4:45 pm. sept. 14 2013

  i was watching an airliner fly over head while at the pool side (grilling up a steak). i particularly liked the bright white color of the underbelly and wings. and took time to notice the fairly bright red painted tail. ('military plane'? i wondered.) 
  the jet was roughly 80 degrees incline from horizon when i first looked up. it moved smoothly along a north / north easterly direction at around , oh, maybe 6000 feet. then a white disc object at around 70 degrees caught my eye. it was just suspended there...Hovering, floating about a wings' width away from the passing jet. 
  i thought for a moment 'is it jupiter'? so bright like that??. nah! no way! to big. compared to the jet, i'd say it was at least the size of the nose section. and roughly 2000/3000 feet above it.   
  i instantly forgot about the plane and said to my daughter " what is that"???. 
  i moved toward the fence that surrounded the pool to use it as a land mark / cross hair to position the object for her. while doing that i noticed it had abruptly lost its bright moon / planet - like glow which i had been observing for approximately 30 seconds: turning to lead-grey color for about 1-3 seconds before it seemingly blinked out. ( and yes, it seemed to blink out a few times.) i looked hard for it but couldn't find it. it was gone!  i was like 'wtf was that?????'
content.summary: Ufo spotted while observing airliner fly by

content.detailedDescription:
While out walking my dog at 4:45am mst  on september 15th, 2013 i observed single light shoot a crossed sky in an arcing motion lasting about 15sec similar of what you would expect to see from a shooting star or meteor although there was no light emitting trail. the brightness of the object varied then stopped, it lit up bright then went dimmed  blacked out.  it seemed to come out of nowhere.  

it relit, shot up at an angle in a wobbling motion, the object was randomly lighting up and off going in a wobbling circular motion  like trying to gain attitude then falling somewhat. this last for about 3-5 minutes. varying from left to right, up and down and  lights sporadically going on and off then the object  seemed to stabilized  

i continued to watch for about 1minute  the object would go completely dark staying in one spot to  fully illuminated and then randomly blinking three or four times  then go dark this occurred a few times.  at this point my dog distracted me and i looked down. when i looked back up to the sky the light/object was gone.
content.summary: Strange light in sky

content.detailedDescription:
I sent a similar e-mail to debbie ziegelmeyer and margie kay but thought i should post it here as well. maybe there is an explanation for this event?????

i stepped out onto my back deck, (evening of saturday, september 14th) started to sit down on a chair but looked up before doing so. coming from the direction of the southeast there is a bright orange round object moving over my house. higher then a helicopter but much closer then an airplane. 

it is bright orange on the outside/underside but a deeper orange in the center. the color in the center seemed to be moving but that might have something to do with the atmosphere. i stepped into the house and the clock reads 9:40 pm. 

about 30 seconds later a second one appears coming from the same direction, displaying the same thing as the first.

about 30 seconds after that another orange one goes over my house but still at a level that i could see the darker orange moving around inside the center. all three objects move out of sight into the northwest sky.

i went back outside and have been watching but i do not think any more will come tonight. i am not very good at trying to judge size and distance but they were close and big enough that i could see the variance of the orange colors inside the spheres. i believe if i would stretch out my arm, the objects would be about the size of the palm of my hand. this is the first time i have seen anything like this. i did have trouble sleeping; i kept seeing images of them in my mind all night long.
content.summary: See below

content.detailedDescription:
Saw bright orb approaching at a good clip from north east over rexham beach, stopped for 30 seconds dimmed ascended about 500 feet then brightened and took off east south east direction. when i observed this i was positioned around telegraph hill 150 feet above sea level looking out my bedroom window, i was awake and alert.
object was above the ocean not on the surface. definitely seemed as if under intelligent control.

questions from side of text box.

1.  where were you and what were you doing at the time? " i was in bed looking out my bedroom window."

2. what made you first notice the object? " object came into view as a fast moving orb."

3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it? my thoughts were "no way it couldn't be a ufo" but i can't say it wasn't.

4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail. " see above"

5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object. " my feelings were shocked, my reaction was, excited and then the hair stood up on my back. i wanted to get the camera but i didn't want to loose site of the object.

6. how did you lose sight of the object? i watched it speed up in the direction of east south east out to sea.

i am going to position a camera on a tripod ready to shoot.
content.summary: Saw bright orb approaching at a good clip, stopped dimmed ascended about 500 feet then brightened and took off south east direction

content.detailedDescription: Me my dad and my brother were looking for ufos then i saw 10-13 white lights in a circal about 15 feet over the trees it went behinde the trees and disapered
content.summary: White lights in a circle

content.detailedDescription: Sometime during the late 90's a crop circle appeared in a small inland florida town. the field was immediately cut down to avoid any publicity. since then according to numerous witnesses unidentified lights have appeared in the sky in the area. these reports of seeing lights have even been shared and corroborated on facebook right after they occurred. just this past early august two brothers were running in the area not far from their home and came across something in the middle of the road. according to their account of what happened it was a humanlike being that fled from them in a very fast stealthy manner. they described it being much larger than them taking up half of the road and crawling at first. they also claimed at one point it covered about ten feet in a single bound and jumped a fence. they felt like it did not want to be seen and described it as acting like a fugitive running from the law. they could hear it moving and heard it rattle a fence. then the one brother shines his flashlight in the area where it sounded like it was. he then saw the being slowly move it's head up to his light. he described it as humanlike but with no hair and a larger forehead. the eyes that he saw lit up were described as human but catlike. as soon as the eyes looked back at him he was overcome with fear. then a blue beam of light appeared from the ground to the sky and disappeared. they ran from the area as fast as they could.
content.summary: Two brothers 18 and 16 years of age are running down the road near their house and encounter a humalike being and a blue beam of light.

content.detailedDescription: Out shopping. in parking lot looked up and saw 3 circle like objects. the color started off like a pinkish red. disappeared before our eyes. started driving home and spotted 2 of them. i grabbed camera and got out of car. i went to take picture when 3rd one reappeared. it was bigger and looked like a fireball. it was moving faster as though it was trying to catch up with other two. lost behind some trees, we decided to drive up hill. tried to video tape again until they disappeared. at one point video taped them in same spot for up to 3 minutes with no movement (hovering)   later at home watched video and noticed something my plain eyes didn't see. orbs or other circle objects flew right inside the other circle object. it was very odd. i'd like to mention that it was an almost full moon, a few obvious stars in the sky but the rest was as clear as can be. it was not a plane. it didn't always move in straight path. it made no noise. it wasn't a meteror, i've seen those. this was completely different
content.summary: 3 fireball like objects that hovered at times. we followed

content.detailedDescription: The objects appeared to be coming from the local air port but the airport shows no aircaft leaving anytime before during or right after then event. it was unbelievable in person.
content.summary: Many bright orange lights flying one behind the other more than 10

content.detailedDescription:
Went to take my dogs outside this evening and i noticed the moon was glowing extra bright this evening. i looked up and noticed an object of light that started to appear while traveling south east, the closer it got too the moon the brighter the object got. once the object got across the moon the light began to fade until i couldnt see it anymore, seemed like it just disappeared  
out of no where the same way it appeared to me at first.
content.summary: Light appeared traveled across the moon then faded.

content.detailedDescription: Saw 4 bright orange lights sphere type , all in a straight line about 1km apart each then all turned together then disspeared into the sky
content.summary: 4 orange objects in a straight line then turned together then dissapeared

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my back deck watching my dogs bark at a squirrel in a tree beside our house when the object came over the same tree's.

at first i thought it was some kind of hang glider but i realized that it was larger than a hang glider.

the object looked boomerang shaped. it was kind of like a triangle but with no tail and the middle was transparent and we could see the sky though it.
the right side looked red and the left side looked silver.
the object flew in one direction until it was out of site.

when i first saw it i called my wife then called my 16 year old son so we all three saw it.

there was no sound at all.

my son is taking flight lessons and knows most airplanes and he had never seen this.
we have planes of all kinds fly over all of the time and this was no plane that any of us had ever seen.

the speed was about the same as a turboprop plane but was smaller than a turboprop.
content.summary: Watched boomerang   shapped object fly over our house.

content.detailedDescription: I was returning home from playing adult hockey driving south on route 44 (mantua) in portage county ( i had nothing to drink)and was getting ready to make a left hand turn to head down my road when i looked up to see the moon and immediately noticed 4 orange lights just below the moon. the light in front was lower than the second, the third was in same position as the first and the last light in same position as second. a kind low, high, low ,high deal if that makes any sense. i had no idea what i was looking at so i made the turn onto my road and immediately pulled over and grabbed my cell phone in hopes of taking a photo. the view in my camera was so poor i ended up not taking a photo because it didn't show anything i was actually seeing. i was standing outside of my vehicle for 2 -3 minutes just watching these lights move in a straight line to the southeast. i watched until some cloud cover moved in and began to cover up the lights. i then jumped back into my truck and headed down my road ...Which was the direction the lights were generally moving. i drove down my road which is down hill and has the cuyahoga river running in the back yard. it is a heavily wooded area and the canopy of trees and clouds did not allow me to relocate the lights i saw at the top of the road.
content.summary: Noticed 4 orange lights in sky

content.detailedDescription:
i left tomy's restaurant at 10:50 pm being they were closing.  as i walked down a main street on my way home i saw a big light flying low in my direction a little to my left.  when i cut through apartment alleys as my short-cut i noticed the light was coming towards me near my street.  when i was in the preschool parking lot near my street the light stopped and hovered about 35 feet from me over the preschool playground near a big tree.  the big light was actually 2 car high beam lights in the front of a white painted 16' in diameter round object.  it hovered in complete silence.  the center of it had bubble glass panels that went all around.  each panel was about 6 feet long, and they all measured about 3' in diameter.  it was very dark inside the panels.  the high beam car headlights were about 6" apart.  
   when i thought it was a junky looking ufo probably belonging to teen aliens that it probably cannot fly very fast, it quickly budged then disappeared in a fraction of a second northward.  the only way i knew of its direction of departure was from a 10' long tracer from the high beam car lights.  the tracer was open at the end nearest me, and closed on the other end.  it was angled a little northward.

thank you,

thomas
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo over neighboring pre-school

content.detailedDescription:
Yesterday evening, sept 14th 2013,  i went out in my backyard to star gaze, it was a clear cool night with no cloud cover, and the was moon positioned in the southern sky. i noticed planes and even some satellites. i decided to bring out my camera with my tripod to photograph the stars, something i hadn't tried before. my photos turned out great, and i was surprised to see so many stars, some i couldn't even see with the naked eye. however, in three sets of photos, i noticed some objects i could not explain. i'd like to mention that i took photos of planes and satellites, and they made a trail, due to the exposure rate i had set on my camera, so i know what they look like in a photo. there is also a small airport about a mile from the home, so i'm familiar with conventional aircraft in the area. in these sets, i had photos taken of the same area over the course of about a minute, so as to see the movement of the stars. i have three sets of three photos each to report.

in one of the sets, the second photo revealed a squiggly object, which only appeared in that photo, neither the preceding nor proceeding photo had any shot of this object. it appeared as two squiggles, but that is because of minor shaking by me. the time stamp of this set is 8:18:24 p.M ,8:18:34 p.M, and 8:18:44 p.M. photos are 7017 to 7019.

in the second set of photos, an object appears in the second photo, in the bottom right quadrant of the frame. it is above and to the right of binary stars, or two stars next to each other, but then disappears.  the timestamp of this set is 10:34:55 p.M, 10:35:10 p.M, and 10:35:29 p.M. photos are 7106 to 7108.

the last set has an object appearing in each of the photos of the set, in the bottom right quadrant of the frames, seen moving in the opposite direction of the stars.It can be seen about 35 degrees to the right from the pink star at the bottom of the photo, and then moving southwest in the frame, between two two stars! the timestamp of this set is 10:39:39 p.M, 10:39:56 p.M, and 10:40:14 p.M. photos are 7118 to 7120. 

i showed these photos to my family, and edited the photos in order to see the objects more clearly, but am still unsure of what they are. i have the raw images available for further analysis, as/if necessary. we just want to know what they are, as it has us stumped. there was another set of five photos wherein an object is in the upper right side of the frame, moving down as the photos progress, but it is very faint, and so it isn't included in this report.
content.summary: Caught unknown aerial phenomena on camera, only noticed after having reviewed photos.

content.detailedDescription:
Well it all started on the morning of the 27th i awoke with a headache and felt like my eardrums were ringing.Then i went on to my back porch and noticed silver balls appearing out of the darkness.I noticed how they were rising out of the ground and covered by reflective surface.Within minutes the fog cleared and it became visible a large metallic shape.Id guess it was miles across.I thought i was loseing it.
the next night i noticed the lights were ,moveing around in the back yard.I know every star and these did not make since these were not of ground but at a height of 50 feet away.I became aware of them and have been documenting everything since then.Know they are comeing right up to me and allowing me to capture them clearly.I have amazing proof of how they work.They hide in front of a lightsource and project there image threw that source.Much like a hologram does.They are watching every neighbour and scanning us.They are talking to me but i wont report that here.This is not one sighting its been every day since and i have taken a thousand images and want it all to be released.Also i wont say everything here.
content.shape: Circle,   Cylinder,   Diamond,   Fireball,   Sphere,   Triangle
content.summary: This has been happening for a while since august 28 strange,entity and observers looking in windows.

content.detailedDescription: I was with my little brother night fishing at a friends pond. i noticed a bright object appear to the north that then faded to the brightness of the rest of the stars. i thought it might be an airplane but didn't see any navigation lights, which i thought was curious. the object look like a star but was moving across the sky so i then thought it might be a satellite but moving much faster than satellites that i had seen in the past. i kept watching as it traveled across the sky and then it turned upward and as it ascended it faded out. i was trying to get my brother to look but by the time he turned it was gone. i then called my dad and let him know what just occurred.
content.summary: Saw a bright light appear then fade to star like brightness. traveled from w to e then turn upward and faded out.
